title: Evanescence - Live at E-Werk - Cologne, Germany (17.Oct.2003) [3
description:
Recorded live in Cologne, Germany on the 17th of October 2003 and taken straight from a TV broadcast, this 'bootleg' offers an excellent insight of one of Evanescence's best gigs, in which the multi platinum Fallen album received amazing live airing.  Amy is excellent and this is certainly a piece of art. Setlist wise, Zero receives a rare and powerful rendition and the bands stage presence is very good throughout.

Setlist:

1. Haunted 
2. Going Under 
3. Taking Over Me 
4. Everybody's Fool 
5. My Last Breath 
6. Farther Away 
7. Even in Death 
8. Zero (The Smashing Pumpkins cover)
9. Breathe No More 
10. My Immortal 
11. Bring Me to Life 
12. Tourniquet 
13. Imaginary 
14. Whisper

Enjoy! :)
